'''''Relics of the Righteous''''' was a book written by [[Thontoros|Thontoros the Learned]], the Sage of the Just Gods.

Amongst other things, it detailed the enchantment of the magical sword ''[[Dornavver]]'' at [[Allyn's Anvil]] in [[275 DR|Year of the Wrath Sword, 275 DR]].
